name: 3-D Pinball
overview: 3-D Pinball is a pinball game published by Mastertronic for the ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, and Commodore 64 platforms. It features a single isometric table shown on single non-scrolling screen. Despite the name on the case, this game title is shown as Power Pinball on the title screen of all three versions. Steve Walters is credited as the programmer on the title screen of the Commodore 64 and Amstrad CPC version, while no credit is given in the Spectrum ZX version.
